Summary: object was not lit, but 3 obvious red lights at apexes. Lights were off.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was out on the balcony having a cigarette, looking west. Due-West a moving object(s) lit by the street lights of Coast Highway caught my attention. It was 3 red lights in an equilateral triangle, non were lit. They were heading South, parallel with Coast Highway at around 200' altitude. I'd estimate the lights at 50' apart. I watched for close to 20 seconds before it was out of range. Estimated speed was 80 to 100mph. Having spent 5 years as a Merchant seaman I've seen many strange things in the sky. Meteors, satellites, Military and Civilian aircraft, but these 3 unlit red lights were the strangest thing I've ever seen in the sky. I was not drinking (sober 18 years) and am not prone to hallucinations.
trends: There have been 29 other sightings in Oceanside
There were no other sightings in Oceanside on or around January 12th 2013
